name: I'm Lost - Scary Horror Game
description:
Ready to experience the chilling fear? Then download without hesitation! Horror game, here you will feel all the horror.

In the game you have to understand what happened that fateful evening? You woke up, as if not in this life. Avoid monsters lurking in the darkness. Are you ready to be face to face with your fears? I'm lost!..

You are in the car, and then something terrible happens. You feel fear and death at every step. Find out what really happened. What's happening to you?

Unusual atmosphere, nervous scenario, a bloody.

You can't get rid of nightmares and curiosity. There is only one way to get rid of this hell... Of course, something will not leave you alone. If you have the courage, what are you waiting for?

Features last survivor:
- Excellent graphics.
- Detailed locations.
- Alternative music.
- Challenging fun gameplay.
